about_the_game:
Game Introduction

"I's Long Night" is a 2D adventure exploration management game with a slight survival challenge. In the previous story, you used yourself as a medium to seal the loose core of the world, preventing it from collapsing and saving everyone. But after thousands of years, faith changes and chaos strikes again! You were awakened by some inexplicable power, but you were lying in ruins... You have to start all over again, cutting trees, mining, gathering, gathering resources, building facilities, fixing farmland, and building your own home. In the course of the adventure, visiting scholars, consult famous teachers to learn knowledge, research more advanced technology. Complete the royal delegation, become the mayor, and strive to operate and develop their own town, listen to the voice of the people under the government, meet everyone's needs, and take a higher position in the accumulation of prestige. Make friends around the world and recruit them to help you build your own network. Finally, with your unremitting efforts, complete the entire adventure.
